conversations.body_text: 你好，大卫·皮肯，  您的订单已发货。运单号为顺丰速运 • SF6045993559319。
Hi David Picken,   Here is your shipping/tracking record.

Thanks. I've since received notification from the local courier that the package will be delivered on Monday.
